General.Name: Wojas SA
General.Description: Wojas S.A. primarily engages in the manufacture and sale of leather footwear for men and women in Poland. The company's footwear includes shoes, trainers, sneakers, moccasins, pumps, stiletto heels, ballerina flats, lace-up shoes, Chelsea boots, snow boots, elegants, trekkings, prophylactics, slippers, sandals, sliders, heels, and knee-high boots. It also offers bags comprising everyday, crossbody, formal and tote, shopper, and laptop bags, as well as backpacks, handbags, briefcases, sachets/bumbags, and phone cases. In addition, the company offers clothes, including sweatshirts, T-shirts, jackets, and trousers. Further, its accessories comprise bracelets, face masks, wallets, belts, umbrellas, hats, gloves, neck warmers, scarves, socks, laces, shoehorns, boot trees, perfume sachets, shoe inserts, cotton bags, ornaments, home fragrances, and other products. The company offers its footwear for the army, fire brigade, border guards, Polish post office, forestry, and transport services. Wojas S.A. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nowy Targ, Poland. Wojas S.A. operates as a subsidiary of AW Invest Sp. z o.o.

0.Name: Mr. Wieslaw Tadeusz Wojas
